title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at Steph Curry's career resume as game 1 of the NBA Finals tips off tonight and why he doesn't get enough credit for their dynasty run. He believes the Arizona Cardinals need to stop messing around and pay up for quarterback Kyler Murray. He also expresses concern about 1 star player's mindset in the NBA Finals. Plus, 2-time NBA champion Quinn Cook joins the show to talk about what makes the Warriors organization so special. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
